title: Pu'ukani's Song
description: Pu'ukani is a singer and magic weaver.  He also happens to be a whale.  Follow Pu'ukani on his journey with the love of his life and her daughters, to their summer calving grounds. Encounters with humans and killer whales change his entire life, and the life of the clan led by his beloved. Through drama, loss and daring exploration, Pu'ukani finds himself at a cultural crossroads and in a position that breaks all rules. Will he be able to fulfill his duty to his truelove?  Listen to his Song.
author: Hannah Steenbock
